name: Other
wikiDescription: These card backs are uncategorized by Team 5 developers.

name: Basic
wikiDescription: These card backs are available for all players.

name: Fireside
wikiDescription: These card backs can be obtained by participating in [[Fireside Gathering]] activities.

name: Achievements
wikiDescription: These card backs can be obtained by completing [[Achievement]]s or [[Solo Adventure]]s, or reaching milestones in [[Rewards Track]]s.

name: Heroes
wikiDescription: These card backs are associated with [[hero skin]]s and can be obtained either by buying the hero skin or [[expansion]] pre-order bundles.

name: Seasonal
wikiDescription: These card backs can be obtained by winning [[Ranked]] games (sorted by newest season).

name: Legend
wikiDescription: This card back can be obtained by reaching the Legend rank.

name: Esports
wikiDescription: These card backs can be obtained by participating in Esports events.

name: Games
wikiDescription: These card backs promote Blizzard's other games and can be obtained by either playing them or buying associated bundles.

name: Promotion
wikiDescription: These card backs promote platforms that support Hearthstone and can be obtained by using their products.

name: Pre-Purchase
wikiDescription: These card backs can be obtained by purchasing pre-order bundles.

name: Blizzard
wikiDescription: These card backs can only be obtained by participating in BlizzCon events.

name: Golden
wikiDescription: These card backs can only be obtained with a high level finish in official Esports events.

name: Events
wikiDescription: These card backs can be obtained by playing special [[Tavern Brawl]]s or participating in other unique events.
